entries.title: AWS This Week: Inspector supports AWS Lambda functions, AWS KMS XKS, Amazon Lex adds languages
entries.description:
Michael is back with your AWS news! This week in AWS announcements, Amazon Inspector now supports AWS Lambda functions, AWS KMS adds support for external key stores, and AWS Verified Access for cloud-based applications now in preview. Also, Amazon Lex adds support for 6 more languages.

Introduction to AWS updates (0:00)
Amazon Inspector support for AWS Lambda functions (0:37)
AWS KMS launches External Key Store (1:26)
Announcing the preview of AWS Verified Access (2:29)
Amazon Lex launches support for more languages (3:31)

Start your cloud journey and sign up now
https://plrsig.ht/youtube-cloudhappy

Subscribe to A Cloud Guru for AWS latest updates and service announcements, every week
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp8lLM2JP_1pv6E0NQ38pqw/?sub_confirmation=1

Like us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/acloudguru 

Follow us on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/acloudguru

Join the conversation on Discord!
https://discord.com/invite/pluralsight 

—
- AWS announces Amazon Inspector support for AWS Lambda functions: https://bit.ly/3iVCjed
- What is Amazon Inspector: https://bit.ly/3uHTMtC
- AWS KMS launches External Key Store: https://bit.ly/3v09kcl
- Announcing AWS KMS External Key Store (XKS): https://bit.ly/3uJ64la
- AWS Verified Access Preview — VPN-less Secure Network Access to Corporate Applications: https://bit.ly/3uFiMRV
- Announcing the preview of AWS Verified Access: https://bit.ly/3iRXb6f
- AWS Verified Access Documentation: https://bit.ly/3BPahIj
- Tutorial: Getting started with Verified Access: https://bit.ly/3PkbbSD
- Amazon Lex launches support for Arabic, Cantonese, Norwegian, Swedish, Polish, and Finnish: https://bit.ly/3Br51dx
- Languages and locales supported by Amazon Lex V2: https://bit.ly/3iUUEZ9
- What is Amazon Lex: https://bit.ly/3YflNpJ
 
#awsthisweek #aws #awsnews
